sql-map.name: SupplierMasterTOMap
sql-map.mapped-statement: INSERT INTO SUPPPLIER_MASTER (SUPPLIERID, SUPPLIERNAME, STREET, AREA, CITY, STATE, PINCODE, COUNTRY, TINNO, CST, ADDRREMARKS, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DT, STATUS, STATUS_BY, STATUS_DT, AUTHORIZE_STATUS, AUTHORIZE_BY, AUTHORIZE_DT, BRANCH_CODE ) VALUES ( #supplierid:VARCHAR#, #suppliername:VARCHAR#, #street:VARCHAR#, #area:VARCHAR#, #city:VARCHAR#, #state:VARCHAR#, #pincode:VARCHAR#, #country:VARCHAR#, #tinno:VARCHAR#, #cst:VARCHAR#, #addrremarks:VARCHAR#, #createdBy:VARCHAR#, #createdDt:DATE#, #status:VARCHAR#, #statusBy:VARCHAR#, #statusDt:DATE#, #authorizeStatus:VARCHAR#, #authorizeBy:VARCHAR#, #authorizeDt:DATE#, #branchCode:VARCHAR#)

UPDATE SUPPPLIER_MASTER SET SUPPLIERID = #supplierid:VARCHAR#, SUPPLIERNAME = #suppliername:VARCHAR#, STREET = #street:VARCHAR#, AREA = #area:VARCHAR#, CITY = #city:VARCHAR#, STATE = #state:VARCHAR#, PINCODE = #pincode:VARCHAR#, COUNTRY = #country:VARCHAR#, TINNO = #tinno:VARCHAR#, CST = #cst:VARCHAR#, ADDRREMARKS = #addrremarks:VARCHAR#, CREATED_BY = #createdBy:VARCHAR#, CREATED_DT = #createdDt:DATE#, STATUS = #status:VARCHAR#, STATUS_BY = #statusBy:VARCHAR#, STATUS_DT = #statusDt:DATE#, AUTHORIZE_STATUS = #authorizeStatus:VARCHAR#, AUTHORIZE_BY = #authorizeBy:VARCHAR#, AUTHORIZE_DT = #authorizeDt:DATE#, BRANCH_CODE = #branchCode:VARCHAR# WHERE SUPPLIERID = #supplierid:VARCHAR#
UPDATE SUPPPLIER_MASTER SET STATUS = #STATUS:VARCHAR#, STATUS_BY = #USER_ID:VARCHAR#, STATUS_DT = (SELECT SYS_DATE() FROM DUAL) WHERE SUPPLIERID = #supplierid:VARCHAR#
